Description: Green glazed composition amulet in the form of a human-headed sphinx or cat, with hair arranged in four tresses; pierced suspension ring at the back.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Gen Sir John Grenfell Maxwell
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.78. For comparable pieces, see J Bulte, Talismans Egyptiens d'heureuse maternite (Paris, 1991), 50-55, 84, pl 27-29.
